name: OVERAY STUDIO
summary: OVERAY STUDIO is not just another virtual workspace; it's a fusion of immersive experience and practicality, tailored for both professionals and enthusiasts. At its core, this platform provides access to essential features completely free of charge. Users can effortlessly integrate up to five virtual monitors, enjoying the freedom to customize their spatial layout or opt for our handy preset configurations. The software seamlessly syncs with Windows, ensuring an automatic match with your monitor layout...
